attributes.action: Parliament to Address victim blaming the newspapers
attributes.additional_details:
Eg. INDIA CHIPCHASE
India was a local northamptonian I think it's right our mps stand up for us here and get something done about it.Irrelevant of what was consumed in whatever amount of time she was viciously raped and murdered and this is the kind of victim shaming that needs to stop.The whole town was disgusted by this tragic event and the whole town are disgusted by the sun's headline.
MARK DUGGAN
Innocent photo of a man visiting his child's grave cropped to fit better with a headline.
attributes.background: Tired of newspapers (particularly the sun) being allowed to twist information and constant victim shaming.
